text: Cybersecurity: Additional cryptographic protection for Messages & Drive to enhance data security.
Media/External Link: Images larger than 10MB can now be viewed "in app" eliminating the need to download them and reducing the risk of Privacy breaches from external apps.
External Link for Folder: Improved UI for better user experience.
Files with long names: Improved UX to make file management easier.
Direct Messages/Channels: Improved navigation by adding an "arrow button" for quick access to the most recent message while scrolling through content.
